data.title: K1 Speed Torrance
data.meta_description: Excellent indoor go-kart racing facility featuring high-performance electric karts capable of...
data.text:
Address: 19038 S Vermont Ave, Gardena, CA

Excellent indoor go-kart racing facility featuring high-performance electric karts capable of reaching speeds upwards of 45 miles per hour.

This location (others in Anaheim, Irvine, Burbank) offers guests plenty of free parking, a polished-clean venue, restaurant-style Paddock Lounge, race-themed photo ops, and of course the main attraction – a fast, competitive track.

Cost is $24.95 per race (12 laps). Junior minimum height requirement is 48 inches and adults 58 inches. You can also purchase annual memberships and other packages – including group outings such as parties, events, corporate team building, etc.

For hours of operation and additional info on this location, visit www.k1speed.com/torrance-location.

While in the area, consider checking out the German-themed Alpine Village, Sky Zone Trampoline Park, Hustler Casino, Skechers Factory Outlet, Larry Flynt’s Lucky Lady Casino, and the Porsche Experience Center.

These photos were taken August 2021. Click to enlarge.
